```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, 
                      echo = TRUE, dpi = 300, cache.lazy = FALSE,
                      tidy = "styler")
```

```{r load libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(gamezoneR)
```

```{r Wisconsin schedule}
wisconsin_schedule_2020 <-  gamezoneR::get_team_schedule("Wisconsin", season = "2020-21")
```

```{r Trice's shots}
trice_shots_2020 <- purrr::map_df(wisconsin_schedule_2020$game_id, 
                          gamezoneR::gamezone_cbb_pbp, sub_parse = F) %>% filter(shooter == "D'Mitrik Trice")
```

#### Determine Quadrant

```{r Check Quadrants}
trice_shots_2020 <- trice_shots_2020 %>% mutate(shot_quadrant = factor(if_else(loc_x >= 21 & loc_x <= 25 & ((loc_y - 5.25)^2 + (25 - loc_x)^2 <= 16), "Q1", if_else(loc_x > 25 & loc_x <= 29 & ((loc_y - 5.25)^2 + (loc_x - 25)^2 <= 16), "Q1", if_else(loc_x >= 19 & loc_x <= 31 & loc_y <= 19, "Q2", if_else(loc_x <= 12.5 & three_pt == TRUE, "Q5", if_else(loc_x > 12.5 & loc_x < 37.5 & three_pt == TRUE, "Q6", if_else(loc_x >= 37.5 & three_pt == TRUE, "Q7", if_else(loc_x <= 25, "Q3", if_else(loc_x > 25, "Q4", "NA"))))))))))
```

#### The Number of Shots for each Quadrant

```{r Total by Quadrant}
trice_shot_quadrants <- table(trice_shots_2020$shot_quadrant, trice_shots_2020$shot_outcome)

trice_shot_quadrants
```

```{r Percentages by Quadrant}
trice_quadrant_percentages <- as.data.frame.matrix(round(prop.table(trice_shot_quadrants, 1), digits = 2) * 100)

trice_quadrant_percentages <- trice_quadrant_percentages %>% mutate(Quadrant = 1:nrow(trice_quadrant_percentages))

trice_quadrant_percentages <- trice_quadrant_percentages %>% mutate(color = if_else(Quadrant == 1,if_else(made < 52, "royalblue3", if_else(made < 60, "steelblue1", if_else(made < 63, "gray50", if_else(made < 71, "red3", "red")))), "NA"))

trice_quadrant_percentages <- trice_quadrant_percentages %>% mutate(made = paste0(made,"%"))

trice_quadrant_percentages
```


```{r Trice's Shot Chart}
gamezoneR::base_court +
  geom_point(data = trice_shots_2020, aes(loc_x, loc_y, color = shot_outcome), alpha = 0.6) + geom_text(data = trice_quadrant_percentages, x = 25, y = 7.85, fontface = "bold", color = trice_quadrant_percentages$color, size = 3, aes(label = ifelse(Quadrant == 1, as.character(made),""))) + geom_text(data = trice_quadrant_percentages, x = 25, y = 17, fontface = "bold", color = "red", size = 3, aes(label = ifelse(Quadrant == 2, as.character(made),""))) + geom_text(data = trice_quadrant_percentages, x = 25, y = 32, fontface = "bold", color = "red", size = 3, aes(label = ifelse(Quadrant == 6, as.character(made),"")))  + geom_text(data = trice_quadrant_percentages, x = 6, y = 25, fontface = "bold", color = "red", size = 3, aes(label = ifelse(Quadrant == 5, as.character(made),""))) + geom_text(data = trice_quadrant_percentages, x = 44, y = 25, fontface = "bold", color = "red", size = 3, aes(label = ifelse(Quadrant == 7, as.character(made),""))) + geom_text(data = trice_quadrant_percentages, x = 12.5, y = 15, fontface = "bold", color = "red", size = 3, aes(label = ifelse(Quadrant == 4, as.character(made),""))) + geom_text(data = trice_quadrant_percentages, x = 37.5, y = 15, fontface = "bold", color = "red", size = 3, aes(label = ifelse(Quadrant == 5, as.character(made),""))) + theme(legend.spacing.x = grid::unit(0, 'cm'),  plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", hjust = 0.5, size = 25/.pt, margin = margin(0, 0, 5, 0)), plot.subtitle = element_text(face = "italic", hjust = 0.5, size = 18/.pt), legend.title = element_text(size = 20/.pt, face = "bold"), 
legend.text = element_text(size = 20/.pt), legend.margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 0),
legend.position = 'bottom', legend.box.margin = margin(-35, 0, 0, 0),  plot.margin = margin(5, 0, 5, 0)) + 
labs(title = "D'Mitrick Trice's Shot Chart", subtitle = "2020-21 Season", color = "Outcome", caption = "Chart: @jonmichaelstroh | Data: @gamezoneR")
```
